abstract.t: Interconnection between 5G networks and datacenter networks provide a new use case for NVO3 and for the 3rd Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) "5GLAN" feature. This document describes how layer-2 and layer-3 datacenter VPN technology can interoperate with anchor User Plane Functions (UPF) to interconnect 5G devices and datacenter servers over a virtual LAN.
